means: 一夫多妻的，一妻多夫的

sentence.Network_en: Less than 1 percent of the men in any Muslim country are polygamous.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何一个伊斯兰国家一夫多妻的男子都不到1％。

sentence.Network_en: Practice of polygamy and polygamous marriages are outlawed in many countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 多配偶制的情况以及多配偶的婚姻在许多国家是被明令禁止的.

sentence.Network_en: They formed an exclusive, polygamous community with a militia and territorial ambitions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们组成一个排外的, 一夫多妻的社会,有自己的民兵武装和对领土的野心.

杂性花(polygamous flower):指一种植物既有单性花, 又有两性花,如文冠果、元宝枫。 所有文档>>数字媒体>>基础科学>> 被子植物分类基础文档简介道客巴巴精品.
polygamous animal 多配偶动物polygamous marriage 多偶婚姻-

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Greek polugamos (from polu- 'much, often' + -gamos 'marrying') + -ous

entry.tran: 多配偶（制） 的；（尤指）一夫多妻的
entry.def: In a polygamous society, people can be legally married to more than one person at the same time. A polygamous person, especially a man, is married to more than one person.

example.ex: Less than 1 percent of the men in any Muslim country are polygamous.
example.tran: 任何一个伊斯兰国家一夫多妻的男子都不到1％。

means.word_mean: 1. having more than one mate at a time; used of relationships and individuals
2. having several forms of gametoecia on the same plant
